remarks: Lemma for ~ bpos .  Since the binomial coefficient does not have any primes in the range ` ( 2 N / 3 , N ] ` or ` ( 2 N , +oo ) ` by ~ bposlem2 and ~ prmfac1 , respectively, and it does not have any in the range ` ( N , 2 N ] ` by hypothesis, the product of the primes up through ` 2 N / 3 ` must be sufficient to compose the whole binomial coefficient.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Mar-2014.)
